Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Cryppto> All I am saying is that KMD holders should be somehow engaged in the financial results of Atomic DEX. The value of KMD would skyrocket if there was a direct/indirect mechanism of participating in the revenues coming from 0.15% fees. But it would mean KMD is a security. So there would be troubles in the USA.
